item.title: Cognitive profile, neuroimaging and fluid biomarkers in post-acute COVID-19 syndrome
item.description: Núria Guillén*, Agnès Pérez-Millan*, Neus Falgàs, Gema M Lledó-Ibáñez, Lorena Rami, Jordi Sarto, Maria A Botí, Cristina Arnaldos-Pérez, Raquel Ruiz-García, Laura Naranjo, Bàrbara Segura, Mircea Balasa, Roser Sala-Llonch, Albert Lladó, Sarah M Gray, Jason K Johannesen, Madeline M Pantoni, Grant A Rutledge, Ruta Sawant, Yi Wang, Luke S Watson, Josep Dalmau, Raquel Sánchez‐Valle. (* equivalent contribution). Scientific Reports. ABSTRACT We aimed to characterize the cognitive profile of post-acute COVID-19 syndrome (PACS) patients with cognitive complaints, exploring the influence of biological and psychological factors.

item.title: AAIC 2023
item.description: AUTHORS: Núria Guillén, Agnès Pérez-Millan, Neus Falgàs, María Ángeles Botí, Adrià Tort-Merino, Gema María Lledó-Ibáñez, Raquel Ruiz-García, Laura Naranjo, Lorena Rami, Mircea Balasa, Roser Sala-Llonch, Albert Lladó, Raquel Sanchez-Valle. TITLE: Cognitive symptoms associated with COVID-19: neuropsychological and biochemical characterization. CONFERENCE: Alzheimer’s Association International Conference (AAIC) 2023 PLACE: Amsterdam, Netherlands DATES: July 16 - 20, 2023
